stanzas: Now unto the king, eternal immortal, invisible the only wise God be honour and glory forever and ever, amen.
Amen be honour and glory forever and ever, amen.
Now unto the king eternal, immortal, invisible the only wise God be honour and glory forever and ever, amen.
Amen be honour and glory forever and ever, amen.
Now unto the king eternal, immortal, invisible the only wise God be honour and glory forever and ever, amen.
Amen be honour and glory forever and ever, amen.
Amen be honour and glory forever and ever, amen.
